darunu sulan thaththwaya pereda (08) aluyama 1.30ta pamana aarambha wi athath ee pilibandawa kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa dhiwara amathyanshaye sodisi meheyum paniwuda huwamaru madhyasthana wetha danum di aththe edina udasana 5.00ta pamana bawa dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana wada balana amathi sarath kumara gunarathna mahatha pawasiya.darunu sulan thaththwaya athiwu wahama ee bawa danum dunne nam mita wada dhiwara jiwitha hani walakwa ganimatada bottu ha upakarana aadiyatada hani nowana paridden godabimata genwa ganimata thibu bawada ee mahatha sandahan kaleya.dhiwarayan wenuwenma wu sodisi meheyum paniwuda huwamaru madhyasthana 10k rata pura dhiwara pradeshawala thibena athara me sulan thaththwaya nisi paridi sanniwedanaya wuye nam mebandu wipathakata ada ema janathawa muhuna nodena bawada amathiwaraya kiweya.yalpanagiya upakarana mangin katayuthu karana aayathana nisa nisi paridi kalaguna thaththwaya pilibanda dana ganimata rate janathawata athi ayithiya ahimi wima nisa dhiwara prajawageda jana jiwithaya anduru wi giya bawada me siddhiyen thahawuru wana bawada gunarathna mahatha penwa dunneya.mewani wipath sidu nowimata kalaguna widya departhamenthuwata nawa thakshana upakarana menma thawa thawath danumen paripurna wu niladharinda yoda ganna lesa janadhipathithumange karunika awadhanaya yomu karana lesa illa sitina bawada prakasha kaleya.dhiwara amathyansha lekam ha dhiwara adhyaksha janaral athulu niladharin eeye (9) sita wipathata path dhiwarayange pradesha wetha gos jiwitha hani, dal aampanna hani pilibanda soya bala owun wetha wiyali salaka labadima pilibandawada soya baliya..

e.ja.pa.ya wadakarana janathawage ghathakaya lesa ithihasaye kriyakala athara ja.wi.pe. kriya kele wada karana janathawa dangediyata dakkana udawukaruwage bhumikawaya. 1980 wada warjanayedi ja.wi.pe. sahaya dunne e.ja.pa.yataya. ehidi kanda koppa satan epa kiyamin ja.wi.pe. satana pawa dun athara wada warjakayan dahas gananak eka pan paharin gedara yawu e.ja.pa. aanduwa in nonawathi warjakayanta pahara dunne polu muguru ha bayisikal chenwalini.1988-89 bhishana samayedi janatha wimukthi ;paramune mara duthayo ahinsaka sisun ha tharunayan kulappu kara owun dangediyata dakkagena giya athara e.ja.pa. alugosuwo ee tharuna jiwitha 60,000k pamana winasha kalaha.
